tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bioenergy_production_systems (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  production_capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Production (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT REFERENCES Bioenergy_Plants(plant_id),
  resource_id INT REFERENCES Bioenergy_Resources(resource_id),
  production_date DATE NOT NULL,
  production_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Production
(
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_date DATE,
  production_location VARCHAR(255),
  production_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Resources
(
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_type VARCHAR(255),
  resource_quantity FLOAT,
  resource_unit VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Equipment
(
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  equipment_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Staff
(
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name VARCHAR(100),
  staff_role VARCHAR(100),
  staff_salary FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Reports
(
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  report_description TEXT,
  report_author VARCHAR(100)
);
